chart_description: This chart displays the number of connection tracker errors per second on the system. These errors can indicate issues with network connections and can impact system performance.

dimension_descriptions.drop: The number of connections dropped by the connection tracker due to errors.
dimension_descriptions.early_drop: The number of connections dropped by the connection tracker that were detected to be invalid early in the connection process.
dimension_descriptions.icmp_error: The number of ICMP packets that caused errors in connection tracking.
dimension_descriptions.insert_failed: The number of connection insertion attempts that failed due to an error in connection tracking.
